frontmatter.title: Build Simple Timeline in React
frontmatter.description: A lot of portfolio websites today have some sort of a timeline which can be used in different ways. You can showcase your job and education history, past projects, your blog posts and everything else that can be structured in a timeline. You can potentially build this on your own, or you can use one of the existing plugins which are very easy to setup and look pretty good out of the box. I will show you one of those plugins and an example of how you can generate all elements with some simulated data and you will have your own timeline in no time.
